Modern.description: Clean lines, minimalist aesthetic, and focus on functionality. Characterized by neutral colors, sleek furniture, and uncluttered spaces.
keyElements: Neutral color palette (white, gray, black, beige)
tips: Remove excessive decorations and keep surfaces clear
Invest in quality statement furniture pieces
Use subtle textures to add visual interest
Modern.amazonProducts: modern minimalist furniture, geometric wall art, led strip lights

Scandinavian.description: Light, airy spaces with functionality at the core. Features pale colors, natural materials, and cozy textiles (hygge vibes!).
tips: Paint walls white or very light gray
Add warm wood tones through furniture
Maximize natural light with sheer curtains
Scandinavian.amazonProducts: scandinavian furniture, sheepskin rug, hygge candles

Bohemian.description: Eclectic, colorful, and free-spirited. Mix of patterns, textures, and global-inspired decor with a relaxed, artistic vibe.
tips: Layer rugs and textiles for depth
Add macrame, rattan, and woven pieces
Use floor cushions and low seating
Bohemian.amazonProducts: macrame wall hanging, boho throw pillows, rattan furniture

Industrial.description: Raw, unfinished aesthetic inspired by warehouses and factories. Exposed brick, metal, and reclaimed wood are key.
keyElements: Neutral with pops of bold color
tips: Keep color palette neutral with metal accents
Industrial.amazonProducts: industrial pipe shelves, edison bulb lights, metal bar stools

Farmhouse.description: Rustic charm meets cozy comfort. Features distressed wood, vintage finds, and a warm, welcoming atmosphere.
tips: Use barn doors or sliding doors
Use white with natural wood accents
Farmhouse.amazonProducts: farmhouse decor, shiplap wallpaper, barn door hardware

Mid-Century Modern.description: Retro 1950s-60s style with organic curves, bold colors, and iconic furniture pieces. Clean and timeless.
keyElements: Mix of wood and plastic materials
tips: Invest in iconic mid-century furniture pieces
Mix warm wood with colorful accents
Mid-Century Modern.amazonProducts: mid century modern furniture, sunburst mirror, retro wall clock

Minimalist.description: Less is more. Extremely simplified spaces with only essential furniture and decor. Calm, clutter-free, and intentional.
tips: Use hidden storage to maintain clean lines
Minimalist.amazonProducts: minimalist storage, floating shelves, hidden storage furniture

Coastal.description: Beach-inspired, light and breezy. Features ocean colors, natural textures, and nautical touches.
tips: Use white as base with blue accents
Add natural fiber rugs and baskets
Use sheer white curtains for light
Coastal.amazonProducts: coastal decor, jute rug, rope mirror

Traditional.description: Classic, elegant, and timeless. Features rich colors, ornate details, and symmetrical arrangements.
Traditional.amazonProducts: traditional furniture, damask curtains, ornate picture frames

Contemporary.description: Current and ever-evolving. Smooth lines, comfortable furnishings, and a mix of textures and materials.
tips: Use one or two bold accent colors
Contemporary.amazonProducts: contemporary furniture, abstract wall art, modern lighting

Rustic.description: Nature-inspired with rough, organic textures. Features raw wood, stone, and earthy colors for a cabin-like feel.
tips: Expose natural wood beams if possible
Use stone for fireplace or accent wall
Use wrought iron hardware and fixtures
Rustic.amazonProducts: rustic wood furniture, antler decor, stone veneer

Eclectic.description: Curated mix of different styles, eras, and colors. Balanced chaos with a cohesive thread tying everything together.
keyElements: Mix of furniture styles and periods
tips: Choose one unifying element (color, texture, etc.)
Don't be afraid of bold combinations
Eclectic.amazonProducts: eclectic decor, vintage furniture, global textiles
